what: Get metadata for corpus items — get_corpus_items

Get metadata for corpus items — get_corpus_items
code: get_corpus_items()

title: Get metadata for corpus items — get_corpus_items
code: corpus_items <- get_corpus_items() #> Fetching item metadata for corpus_items #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=e497beceb985aba5cd3bbf4a8abce18d  #> Error in perform_oauth_login(scope = if (length(missing_scope)) missing_scope else scope,     upgrade_credentials = length(missing_scope) > 0): 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get participants — get_participants
code: get_participants(dataset_spec, max_results = NULL)

title: Get participants — get_participants
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Get participants — get_participants
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) participants <- get_participants(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=bb7f5430888bcbe49dcd474cc6d6af18  #> Error in map(rlang::set_names(user_tables), function(table_name) get_datasets_data(dataset_spec,     table_getter(table_name, max_results))): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: groups. #> Caused by error in `map()`: #> ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get run data — get_runs
code: get_runs(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   max_results = NULL )

title: Get run data — get_runs
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Get run data — get_runs
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) runs <- get_runs(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=89456f29c6b03dd7bf1ec2480a9b4573  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get score data — get_scores
code: get_scores(dataset_spec)

text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve.

title: Get score data — get_scores
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) scores <- get_scores(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=6837cd473e9cc5e6a1367d168d85720d  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get metadata for survey items — get_survey_items

title: Get survey data — get_surveys
code: get_surveys(   dataset_spec,   survey_types = c("caregiver", "student", "teacher"),   remove_incomplete_surveys = FALSE,   max_results = NULL )

title: Get survey data — get_surveys
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. survey_types Character vector survey types include (caregiver, student, teacher). remove_incomplete_surveys Boolean indicating whether drop surveys marked incomplete (defaults FALSE). max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Get survey data — get_surveys
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) surveys <- get_surveys(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=17183f40b9fc7eed417fae81f35fb1d7  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

what: Get metadata for trial items — get_trial_items
title: Get metadata for trial items — get_trial_items
Get metadata for trial items — get_trial_items
code: get_trial_items()

title: Get metadata for trial items — get_trial_items
code: trial_items <- get_trial_items() #> Fetching item metadata for trial_items #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=156f6cc7f1f154ff3feb7a329b80f386  #> Error in perform_oauth_login(scope = if (length(missing_scope)) missing_scope else scope,     upgrade_credentials = length(missing_scope) > 0): 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get trial data — get_trials
code: get_trials(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_trials = FALSE,   tasks = NULL,   participants = NULL,   max_results = NULL )

title: Get trial data — get_trials
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_trials Boolean indicating whether drop trials marked invalid (defaults FALSE). tasks Character vector tasks include. participants (Optional) Data frame includes columns "dataset" "user_id", supplied trial data filtered user IDs. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Get trial data — get_trials
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) trials <- get_trials(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=f03e8c7c9868e4aa9d44d29ea97e9988  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

title: Get trial data — get_trials_prelim
code: get_trials_prelim(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_trials = FALSE,   tasks = NULL,   participants = NULL,   max_results = NULL )

title: Get trial data — get_trials_prelim
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_trials Boolean indicating whether drop trials marked invalid (defaults FALSE). tasks Character vector tasks include. participants (Optional) Data frame includes columns "dataset" "user_id", supplied trial data filtered user IDs. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Get trial data — get_trials_prelim
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) trials_prelim <- get_trials_prelim(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=af4bf10d31aae7b88f6b3d693f7ebf5b  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) trials_raw <- get_trials_raw(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=f1ac437b387afa6b78fc8ad9f9b44cf6  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired

what: Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
title: Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
code: link_surveys(surveys, participants)

title: Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
text: surveys Survey data returned `get_surveys()`. participants Participant data returned `get_participants()`.

title: Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
code: dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current")) surveys <- get_surveys(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=3849d692cd7376f74cf1ff36f63cb124  #> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired participants <- get_participants(dataset_spec) #> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account: #> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=f0eb2e3f45b41791003d1717c6a153b3  #> Error in map(rlang::set_names(user_tables), function(table_name) get_datasets_data(dataset_spec,     table_getter(table_name, max_results))): ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: groups. #> Caused by error in `map()`: #> ℹ In index: 1. #> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r. #> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`: #> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired survey_data <- surveys |>   link_surveys(participants) #> Error: object 'surveys' not found
